short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Visual attribute editor for Webflow. Edit attributes in a sleek modal with instant updates in the Designer.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Webflow Attribute Editor enhances your Webflow Designer experience by allowing you to edit attributes in a sleek and user-friendly modal.

Key Features:
- Visual Editing: Edit attributes like class, id, and custom attributes in a clean, resizable modal interface.
- Instant Updates: Changes reflect live in the Webflow Designer without needing to refresh.
- Auto Formatting: Automatically formats class names into a readable multi-line view, making complex attributes easier to manage.
- Streamlined Workflow: Save time by avoiding manual input tweaks in cramped fields.

How It Works:
1. Install the extension.
2. Open any project in the Webflow Designer.
3. Hover over an input field and click the expand icon to open the modal editor.
4. Make edits and click "Save" to update the attribute instantly.

This extension is designed for Webflow developers and designers who want to work faster and smarter.

Permissions:
This extension requires access to webflow.com to enable its functionality in the Designer environment. It does not collect or store any personal data.

Get started today and make attribute editing in Webflow effortless!
